alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Volusia; Mainland Northern Brevard (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 6:55PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Brevard and southeastern Volusia Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 655 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Maytown, or near Scottsmoor, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oak Hill, Scottsmoor, Mims, Maytown, and Apollo Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Volusia; Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Volusia; Mainland Northern Brevard
